Place the pastries on the plates.
Place the eggs and milk next to the bowl.
Move the fresh-baked cupcake off the tray onto the counter, and place the bowl used for mixing into the sink.
Pick the condiments from the counter and place them in the cabinet.
Pick up the container with dessert and place it on the tray. Pick up the cupcake and place it on the tray.
Pick the receptacles and place them in the sink. Then turn on the water.
Pick the decorations from the dining table and place them in the open cabinet.
Pick the food items from the counter and place them in the cabinet. Then close the cabinet.
Pick the drinks from the island and place them in the open cabinet.
Place the cup inside the bowl on the island and move the bowl to any counter.
Pick the bread, place it on the cutting board, pick the jam, place it on the counter, and close the cabinet.
Pick the mug from the cabinet and place it inside the microwave. Then close the microwave.
Place the pan on the burner on the stove. Then place the tomato and the onion in the pan and turn on the burner.
Open the microwave, place the bowl with waffle inside the microwave, then close the microwave door and turn it on.
Pick the croissant and place it on the pan. Then turn on the stove to warm the croissant.
Retrieve the reheated potato from the microwave, then place it on the cutting board along with cheese and a bottle of condiment.
Push the utensils into the sink.
Pick the cleaning supplies from the cabinet and place them on the counter.
Open the microwave. Then pick the sponge from the counter and place it in the microwave.
Pick the fruit and vegetable from the counter and place them in the cabinet. Then open the drawer and pick the cleaner and sponge from the drawer and place them on the counter.
Pick up the decoration and the alcohol in the cabinet and move them to the dining counter.
Open the cabinet, pick up the bread from the cabinet and place it in the bowl. Then move the bowl to the dining counter.
Move the condiments from the cabinet to the dining counter.
Move the bowls from the cabinet to the plates on the dining table.
Move the drinks to the dining counter.
Stack the cups/bowls from largest to smallest.
Stack the bowls in the sink.
Pick the pan and sponge and place them into the sink. Then turn on the water.
Pick the mug and place it in the sink. Pick the bowl and place it in the cabinet and then close the cabinet.
A wet mug is on the counter and needs to be dried. Pick it up and place it upside down in the open cabinet.
Pick the cup and bowl from the sink and place them on the counter for drying.
